summary: The docs/source package provides utilities for automated documentation generation, including dynamic module importing, callable extraction, and assembly of reStructuredText comparison sections, alongside a Sphinx configuration that sets up paths, version information, extensions, theme selection, and source‑code link creation.
business_intent: To simplify and automate the production of project documentation, enabling up‑to‑date API comparison tables and consistent Sphinx builds with proper versioning and navigation to source code.
